Applicant : Jones, Rhett
School (district) : New Plymouth High School (New Plymouth School District)
Role(s) : High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : I spent 18 years working as a manager for multiple big tech companies in customer service.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As an educator, it will help to build skills in areas that my job teaching doesnt necessarily address, giving me extra areas to be able to connect with student. It will benefit the students by giving me more insightful and informed approaches to discussions about their futures. 
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* In-Person
	* Remote
	* Hybrid
